## LineManager.search() method

Search a line by name (departure - arrival)

**Signature:**

```typescript
search(line: string): Promise<Line[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  line | string | The name of the line |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Line](./sncf.js.line.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

## Example

This example shows how to search a line by name

```javascript
const lines = await client.line.search("Paris - Bordeaux")
console.log(lines)
```
